channel.title: Soon™ - Classcard Thread
channel.description:
# SFoL 57 - Hunger Games - Will be updated
> # The Archer (Unofficial Class) > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Killer** > **Multi-shot (Day)** - If you fire an arrow at one of your marks tonight, remove all marks and attack any other tribute whose mark was removed. You are immune to redirection this night. - 2 uses > **Eagle Shot (Night)** - Fire an arrow to kill your target. This ability is disabled if you kill a member of BD with it. - Infinite uses > **Bulls-eye (Night)** - Place a mark on target tribute. A marked tribute is no longer passively death immune. You may have up to three marks. Targeting a marked tribute with this ability will remove the mark. Targeting yourself will remove all marks. Marks disappear on death or class change. - Infinite uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Butler > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Offensive** > **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. > **Nightshade Wine (Day)** - Poison The President, causing him to die tonight if not healed. The President will not be informed if he is poisoned. If The President is Good, you will commit suicide. - 1 use, available starting Day 2 :crown: > **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a tribute by getting them drunk. - Infinite uses > **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all tributes who visit you tonight (Bypasses occupy immunity). - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Chronomancer > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Support** > **Pocket Dimension (Day)** - If you die tonight, delay it for 2 nights. This will delay bleeding in addition to attacks. - 2 uses > **Time Warp (Night)** - Delays a tribute’s death for 2 days. This will delay ongoing bleeding in addition to attacks. You can prevent a death multiple times. Cannot delay unhealable attacks or suicide. - Infinite uses :crown: > **Distort Reality (Night)** - Redirect all deaths that you have delayed to the target tribute. Can be healed and does not bypass death immunity. - Infinite uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Court Wizard > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Support** > **Arcane Empower (Day)** - The tribute that you target with your ability tonight will bypass immunities (discounting conversion immunity) and be guaranteed to succeed with their actions. Their investigative abilities will always receive correct results. - 2 uses. > **Magical Barrier (Night)** - Protect a tribute from negative effects and conversion tonight. Does not prevent attacks. - Infinite uses > **Ice Ward (Night)** - Prevent anyone else from visiting your target. - 2 uses :crown: > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Drunk > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Offensive** > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become President count as two for you. > **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. > **Debauchery (Night)** - Force a tribute to target a second of your choice. (you won’t be immune to attacks or conversion if you force them to target you). You will only be seen visiting the first. - Infinite use > **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy a tribute, and disable any death or occupy immunity they have for the night. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Good President :crossed_swords: :shield: :fire: > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Special** > **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next President will be held at start of the next day. If you are lynched, all members of the [b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] will lose their Royal Blood passive. > **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two if there are more than 5 tributes alive except during Grand Trial. Immune to occupation and redirection. Your abilities do not count as visits. > **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a ??? on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the tributes alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of tributes vote to execute, the day will end and the ??? on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use > **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a tribute. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: > **Swear Fealty (Night)** - Make a tribute permanently immune to conversion. - 1 use (Starting President Only.) > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Hunter > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Killer** > **Wolf Companion (Day)** - Summon a wolf companion to attack a tribute. They will bleed and die in two nights if not healed. You may not use your Wolf Companion after using your Bear Companion the previous night. - 1 use > **Bear Companion (Night)** - Summon a bear to protect you, granting you death and conversion immunity for the night. You will kill any attackers (Bypasses night immunity). You may not use your Bear Companion after using your Wolf Companion the previous day. - 2 uses > **Hunter’s Mark (Night)** - Target two other tributes. If the first visits the second, you will attack and occupy the first. You will only be seen visiting the first. - 2 Uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Knight > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Killer** > **Armored (Passive)** - Your first successful use of Defend will not kill you. > **Defend (Night)** - You will guard the target tribute tonight, giving your life to kill their attacker(s). - Infinite uses :crown: > **Cold Steel (Night)** - Choose a tribute to attack. If they are a member of the [b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b], you will also take your own life. - Infinite uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # **The Maid** > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Investigative** > **Change Sheets (Day)** - Target two corpses. At the end of the night, learn if they were killed by the same tribute. - 2 uses :crown: > **Rumor (Day)** - Target tribute will be “last checked” in regards to Matchmake. Cannot be used day 1. - 2 Uses. > **Matchmake (Night)** - Test if target is compatible with the tribute you last checked. - Infinite Uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Mystic :shield: > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Social** > **Religious Fervor (Passive)** - Your presence ensures that any religious rivals do not nest in Adiart. The Priest will not spawn. > **Telepathy (Day)** - Anonymously send a single 1000 character message through the host to a ???. - 2 uses > **Link Minds (Day)** - Select two ???s that will have a private night chat for this night. Can select yourself. You will be privy to the chat at the end of the night. Can be used alongside Telepathy. - Infinite Uses. > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # **The Noble** > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Social** > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become President count as two for you. > **Court Spies (Day)** - Select one ???. If they are a members of the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b], send a message saying “Noble’s Spies close in on you!”. Those targeted members will be removed from ??? chat for the coming night and day. - 2 uses. > **Gossip (Night)** - Target a tribute and learn if any and which of these things happens to them tonight. - Infinite Uses > > ***They were successfully Investigated.*** > > ***They were successfully Occupied.*** > > ***Their target was successfully swapped.*** > > > **Bounty (Night)** - If target ??? is executed tomorrow and is [b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] then there will be an additional vote for execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Observer > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Investigative** > **Little Bird (Day)** - Send a bird to track if target tribute leaves their room that night or not. In addition, you will learn if any tributes visited target tribute or not. You will be told at the end of the night. - 2 uses > **Follow (Night)** - Watch someone to see who visits them. - Infinite uses > **Stalk (Night)** - Track a tribute to determine who they visit. - Infinite uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Physician > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Support** > **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - You are immune to bleeding. > **Inoculate (Day)** - Prevent a player from being poisoned or bled for the rest of the game. Gain three sponsorship points if the target player bleeds after this ability is used on them. - 1 use :crown: > **Exhume (Day)** - At the end of the night, learn what faction killed a player. Gain two sponsorship points if you identify two different factions with this ability. - 2 uses :crown: > **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and curing any poison and bleeding they were suffering from. If they are attacked and you save them, gain three sponsorship points. - Infinite uses :crown: > **Self-Care (Night)** - Heal yourself tonight. If you are attacked and you save yourself, gain five sponsorship points. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Priest (Unofficial Class) :shield: > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Social** > **Religious Fervor (Passive)** - Your presence ensures that any religious rivals do not nest in Adiart. The Mystic will not spawn. > **Call of The Dead (Passive)** - You can talk to the dead at night. > **Last Rites (Night)** - Use target dead [b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Non-Killer’s infinite use ability on an alive tribute. You will only be seen visiting the alive one. You may not use the same corpse more than once - Infinite Uses > **Channel (Night)** - The target dead tribute's voice will be brought back to life until you die. They may speak and use your vote. Upon being converted, target dead tribute will also be converted, provided they can be. You are immune to occupation and redirection while using this ability. - 1 use > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Prince :crossed_swords: :shield: > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Killer** > **Unstoppable (Passive)** - You cannot be occupied at night, even by means that bypass occupy immunity. You are also immune to target changing. > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become President count as two for you. > **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a tribute to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. - Infinite uses > **Execute (Night)** - Kill the tribute you have jailed (Bypasses night immunity and healing). If the executed is a member of the [b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b], you will not be able to execute for the rest of the game. - 3 uses > **Mercy (Night)** - Heal the tribute you have jailed. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
> # The Princess > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Investigative** > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become President count as two for you. > **Flirt (Night)** - Flirt with a tribute, you get a pairing of class types. Their class type will be one of the two. The pairings are Killer/Offensive, Support/Social and Special/Investigative. - Infinite uses > **Will-o-Wisp (Night)** - Release a Will O’ Wisp, lighting your chosen tribute. You will learn their faction. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].*
Each tribute will have their own special Rebellion or Capitol ability/passive.
[details="Example Classcard"] >![image|337x499,50%](upload://wJGd9iG4AnKtrg0XAolQaqLOSp5.jpeg) > # [color=orange]The Physician - Cinna[/color] > > > > **[b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Support** > **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - You are immune to bleeding. > **Capitol Infiltrator ([b][color=#FF5926]R[/color][color=#FA6B24]e[/color][color=#F67D22]b[/color][color=#F19021]e[/color][color=#EDA21F]l[/color][color=#E9B51D]l[/color][color=#E4C71C]i[/color][color=#E0DA1A]o[/color][color=#DCEC18]n[/color][/b] Passive)** - Visiting different player during the night will cause you to gain double the amount of sponsorship points during the night. > **Inoculate (Day)** - Prevent a player from being poisoned or bled for the rest of the game. Gain three sponsorship points if the target player bleeds after this ability is used on them. - 1 use :crown: > **Exhume (Day)** - At the end of the night, learn what faction killed a player. Gain two sponsorship points if you identify two different factions with this ability. - 2 uses :crown: > **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and curing any poison and bleeding they were suffering from. If they are attacked and you save them, gain three sponsorship points. - Infinite uses :crown: > **Self-Care (Night)** - Heal yourself tonight. If you are attacked and you save yourself, gain five sponsorship points. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the [b][color=#FFF9E6]C[/color][color=#F2ECDE]a[/color][color=#E5E0D7]p[/color][color=#D9D4D0]i[/color][color=#CCC8C8]t[/color][color=#C0BCC1]o[/color][color=#B3B0BA]l[/color][/b].* [/details]
